short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to IBM Platform Support resource.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Platform Support Quick Access is a place for you to quickly access various IBM Platform Computing technical support resource, such as:

- IBM Platform Computing product introduction pages
- IBM Platform Computing product support portal
- Online support request service page for quickly creating a new PMR
- Manually selected top 5 articles for reference

More features are coming soon!
